name: Easy Timeout Session
author: Joaquin Ruiz

sections.description:
The Easy Timeout Session WordPress plugin allows you to change the session
duration for the WordPress user.

  1. Open Timeout Session Page

  2. Specify the session length (you can specify in seconds, hours or days)

Do you use worpdress admin with an iPad? Don´t worry, this plugin is fully
adapted for tablets and smartphones.

Thank you for downloading! your feedback is well appreciated!
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload plugin folder easy-timeout-session to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
I cannot set the timeout lower than 5 minutes

By security, the minimum is 5 minutes (300 seconds). If you want to set a lower timeout, send me an email.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Release version.

1.1

  • Fix for nginx servers.
  • Adapted to WP 4.3.1
